name: Resume creation scenario using Google Sheets, Google Docs.
description:
Easily edit the Resume with relevant details from [Google sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gyr8jl1ECHFKG9lXmrPAcJoJPfsSDuoc5sU8_UXUoQU/edit?usp=sharing) 

The document template is found on [Google Docs](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1C1GCCweKiJrcWeVPS85s4hrxkT82tZv0lji3KeYA6-w/edit?usp=sharing)
